title.rendered: Why You NEED  a Carb Detox

content.rendered:
Why You NEED a Carb Detox

WHY YOU NEED A

CARB DETOX

Most Americans eat way too many carbs, which leads to your body having more glucose that it needs—so it stores it as fat.

Learn More!

The Standard American Diet (a.k.a. SAD) is loaded with carbs.

Learn More!

Simple carbs found in white rice, potatoes, and bread cause major spikes in blood sugar.

Learn More!

Too many carbs can cause an imbalance in gut bacteria, causing major gut issues.

Learn More!

When you detox from carbs, you balance your hormones which leads to healthier skin, more energy, and fewer mood swings!

Learn More!

Unfortunately, you will experience some side effects from a carb detox, such as headaches and fatigue. 

Learn More!

During a carb detox, avoid fruits, grains, and high-starch veggies

Learn More!

Instead, focus on meats and low-carb veggies. You can also enjoy nuts and berries in small amounts.

Learn More!

Swipe up for more information on how to do a Carb Detox.

Swipe Up!
